```js
class FormFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { checked: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <FormField id="sample-formfield">
        <Checkbox
          checked={this.state.checked}
          onChange={e => this.setState({ checked: e.target.checked })}
        />
        <label>Checkbox wrapped in a FormField</label>
      </FormField>
    );
  }
}

<FormFieldExample />;
```
